feed.title: Dokploy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.14.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: update GPU setup command to use sudo and add error handling by @vishalkadam47 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/837
  • fix: pin nixpacks version by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/852
  • v0.14.1 by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/853

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.14.0...v0.14.1

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.15.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: add Logto template by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/850
  • chore: update n8n template to 1.70.3 by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/851
  • 560 self hosted gitlab additions by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/854
  • feat(i18n): add japanese language support by @minagishl in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/848
  • fix: error about memoryReservation not set by @hua1995116 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/855
  • 560 self hosted gitlab by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/835
  • feat(i18n): add italian language support by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/863
  • feat: improve github app validation by @kawws in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/859
  • feat(dynamic timestamp): add dynamic discord timestamps by @mezotv in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/864
  • feat(docker): use code editor when displaying container config by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/865
  • feat: add global search command by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/856
  • format: setup .vscode folder with biome.js for consistent format and spacing by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/867
  • fix(setup/validate): arm64 build fixes, improved validation by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/870
  • feat: add unsend template by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/869
  • feat: add langflow template by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/874
  • feat: add huly template by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/875
  • feat: add penpot template by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/880
  • feat: add page titles by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/868
  • refactor: add description on search by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/890
  • 769 elasticsearch new db template by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/891
  • feat: redirect to deployments when click on deploy by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/892
  • refactor: remove calculation and pass resources as the docker api expect by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/893
  • feat(delete): add quick copy to resource to clipboard in delete modal by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/896
  • refactor: remove unused files by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/894
  • feat(logs): new railway inspired logs by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/857
  • feat(server): monospace script editor by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/898
  • chore: clean up page titles by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/900
  • Feat: add remote server audit by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/901
  • v0.15.0 by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/897

Features

üöÄ Enhancements Redesigned Logs Interface: Running and deployment logs have been completely revamped for a cleaner and more intuitive experience.

New Audit Tab: Added a dedicated audit tab to provide security suggestions and improve system reliability.

üõ†Ô∏è Customization Editable Installation Scripts: You can now modify the scripts we execute on remote servers, giving you more control over the installation process.

New Contributors

  • @DJKnaeckebrot made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/854
  • @minagishl made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/848
  • @hua1995116 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/855
  • @kawws made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/859

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.14.1...v0.15.0

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.15.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(logs): multi select fiter logs & hide/show timestamp by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/911
  • Added onedev docker compose by @mohabgabber in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/925
  • feat(discord): remove dots by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/928
  • feat(cluster): use code editor for node config by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/910
  • feat(logs): support ansi codes by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/912
  • fix(preview-deployments): wrap long envs by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/940
  • fix(2fa-login): typo - Setup -> Login by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/939
  • fix(term): fix light mode foreground color by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/936
  • fix(docker): fix for custom registry login by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/937
  • fix(settings/profile): edit profile password fixed by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/949
  • feat(plausible): bump to 2.1.4 by @mezotv in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/941
  • feat(certs): show expiration and chain details by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/929
  • style(notifications): better notification item style by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/948
  • fix: add missing notifications in cron jobs by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/954
  • feat: automatic check for updates by @szwabodev in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/951
  • New Updates UI by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/957
  • feat(ports): implement additional ports management by @lost-end-found in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/930
  • Fix/update fetch by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/958
  • refactor: update digest by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/960
  • v0.15.1 by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/961

New Contributors

  • @mohabgabber made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/925
  • @szwabodev made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/951
  • @lost-end-found made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/930

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.15.0...v0.15.1

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.16.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 540 need more control over docker compose command in deployments by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/963
  • style(notifications): fixed white style by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/967
  • feat(logs): use fancy-ansi for ansi colors by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/965
  • fix: prevent Esc key from closing terminal modals by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/968
  • fix: fixed/improved handling of app names in api by @acgonzales in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/904
  • feat: add swarm overview page by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/921
  • style(preview-deployment): better preview deployment card by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/938
  • feat: option to delete docker volumes on service deletion by @DJKnaeckebrot in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/886
  • feat(notifications): discord decoration toggle by @joaotonaco in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/962
  • fix(setup): use traefik port/version from env by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/972
  • feat(preview-deployments): new UI by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/974
  • feat(traefik/ports): improved UI by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/977
  • fix: show error message when compose builder throws by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/979
  • feat: add hide extra logs by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/984
  • fix(certificates): ensure certificates are accessible by traefik by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/971
  • fix: turn off autoComplete for some inputs by @Barsnes in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/985
  • feat: add support for viewing docker logs in swarm mode by @faytranevozter in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/931
  • Refactor/add no trunc by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/989
  • fix: omit macos files and create folders every time by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/990
  • feat(i18n): add Spanish language support by @jmsx in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/994
  • feat: mongo replica sets by @thewilloftheshadow in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/926
  • feat(i18n): add Norwegian language support by @Barsnes in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/997
  • fix: typo Logssss > Logs by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/999
  • fix: remove unused parsed by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1005
  • Feat: simplify node service log & add badge color on list service/container by @faytranevozter in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1000
  • v0.16.0 by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1006

New Contributors

  • @acgonzales made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/904
  • @joaotonaco made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/962
  • @Barsnes made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/985
  • @faytranevozter made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/931
  • @jmsx made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/994
  • @thewilloftheshadow made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/926

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.15.1...v0.16.0

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.16.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: swarm overview style by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1016
  • fix: inconsistent service card height by @joaotonaco in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1011
  • feat: prevent layout shifting from scrollbar by @joaotonaco in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1010
  • convert email to lower case when loging in by @champ3oy in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1020
  • Spelling and grammar corrections by @jocubeit in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1019
  • Fix/memory reservation by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1021
  • fix: add try catch inside of cron jobs by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1022
  • fix: add provider value in edit destination by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1023
  • refactor: add fallback ipv4 by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1024
  • feat: i18n displays real lang name by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/995
  • feat: add unifi template by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1025
  • fix: missing norwegian lang in select by @190km in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1026
  • feat: local server terminal access by @szwabodev in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/959
  • v0.16.1 by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1027

New Contributors

  • @champ3oy made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1020
  • @jocubeit made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1019

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.16.0...v0.16.1
